Subject: on-premise server error
Description:
Hi,
we have 2 EPP servers, old one- on-premise server on our VMware env, and new one on your datacenter, we migrate clients step by step from the old on-premise server to the new one, we sufferings now an error on the old server (the onpremise), i made reboot via the webUI to the server, but the webUI doesnt respose since the reboot, i have ping to the server and i don't have the root user+password, need your help ASAP please, please call me +972526753204, or send me Teams meeting.
What_We_Know__c: Customer encounter an issue with their EPP server, which is unaccessible.
Next_Steps__c: Scheduled a remote session and fixed the issue.
Solution_Comment__c: Disk issue, the sda4 was corrupted.  We fix it by running the command e2fsck /dev/sda4
